title: What is a computer?
subtitle: A computer is a machine that can be programmed to automatically.
detail: A computer is an electronic device that processes data and performs tasks according to a set of instructions called programs. Computers are used in many areas such as education, business, communication, and entertainment. Examples of computers include desktops, laptops, tablets, and smartphones.

title: What is Flutter?
subtitle: A computer is a machine that can be programmed to automatically.
detail: Flutter is an open-source UI framework created by Google. It is used to build beautiful and fast applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase. Flutter uses the Dart programming language and provides many ready-to-use widgets.

title: What is Dart?
subtitle: A language that tells computers what to do, step by step.
detail: Dart is a programming language developed by Google. It is mainly used with Flutter to build mobile and web applications. Dart is easy to learn, supports object-oriented programming, and helps developers write clean and efficient code.
